feed.title: SAP Community - ABAP Cloud
feed.subtitle: ABAP Cloud Q&A in SAP Community

entry.title: Custom logic for payment advice to add profit center
entry.content:
We are using custom logic for the profit center population in the payment advice form (business context: FINS_PAYMENT_ADVICE_ITEM, ID: FBL_PAYM_ADV_PRINT_ITEM ). The issue is Profit center of the 1st line is repeated for the all the line in the payment advice.

 

DATA: lv_comp        TYPE c LENGTH 4,
      lv_jou         TYPE c LENGTH 10,
      lv_year        TYPE c LENGTH 4,
      lv_pft_ctr     TYPE i_journalentryitem-profitcenter,
      lv_pft_desc    TYPE i_profitcentertext-profitcentername,
      lc_lang        TYPE c LENGTH 1 VALUE 'E',
      wa_item     LIKE LINE OF paymentpaiditems.

 

LOOP AT paymentpaiditems INTO wa_item.

 

  CLEAR: lv_comp, lv_jou, lv_year, lv_pft_ctr, lv_pft_desc.

 

  lv_comp = wa_item-doc2r+0(4).
  lv_jou  = wa_item-doc2r+4(10).
  lv_year = wa_item-doc2r+14(4).

 

  SELECT SINGLE profitcenter
    INTO @LV_pft_ctr
    FROM i_journalentryitem
    WHERE companycode        = @LV_comp
      AND accountingdocument = @LV_jou
      AND fiscalyear         = @LV_year.

 

  IF lv_pft_ctr IS NOT INITIAL.
    SELECT SINGLE profitcentername
      INTO @LV_pft_desc
      FROM i_profitcentertext
      WHERE profitcenter = @LV_pft_ctr
        AND language     = @LC_lang.
  ENDIF.

 

  payment_advice_item_ext-yy1_pftctrpaymentadvic_avi = lv_pft_desc.

 

ENDLOOP.

entry.title: Are These SAP Authorizations Strictly Read-Only?
entry.content:
Can someone confirm whether the following SAP authorizations are strictly read-only, or if any of them allow update or modification operations?

Authorization Object: S_RFC

RFC_TYPE: Function Module

RFC_NAME: *

Activity: Execute

Authorization Object: /SDF/E2E

Activity: 03

Authorization Object: S_ADMI_FCD

S_ADMI_FCD: ST0R

Authorization Object: S_RZL_ADM

Activity: 03

Authorization Object: S_TABU_DIS

DICBERCLS: &NC&, EDI0, SA, SC, SS, SPWD

Activity: 03

 

Thanks,

Chinmayi G Panicker

entry.title: Updates on ODATA V2 Deprecation
entry.content:
Dear Community,

I have confusion on latest rumors' on stopping support for ODATA v2 from SAP. I am not really finding any SAP note on that to get clear idea. Can someone help me to get it and also do you have idea on below points?

  • If ODATA v2 support is going to stop then what will happen to old service/integrations done with non-sap systems after system upgrade?
  • Are ODATA services created through SEGW comes under ODATA v2?
  • If creating ODATA services is not recommended in SEGW then how same can be done in v4 version(may be following RAP Model)?(Any blog or documentation on creating READ, UPDATE, CREATE Operations in ODATA v4 same like how we were doing in SEGW?)

Thanks for your time in reading my queries, please drop ur comments.

Regards,

Omkar

entry.title: how divested consolidation unit is not coming in group data analysis sap fiori app
entry.content: How divested consolidation unit is not coming in group data analysis and group data analysis with reporting sap fiori app. In cds C_CnsldtnRpt30Q, C_CnsldtnRpt40Q and cds P_CnsldtnGroupJrnlEntrItm there are no such checks related to divesture. Table fincs_grpstr is used no where in cds as this table field LYEAR and LPERI fields related to divesture. So how exactly consolidation units which are divested are not coming. What is the logic behind this?

entry.title: CX_SADL_DUMP_APPL_MODEL_ERROR while sending GET Request to ODATA v4 with /IWBEP/IF_V4_DP_BASIC
entry.content:
Dear Community,

I am trying to create ODATA V4 as mentioned in SAP Note 2485370, So I created a custom entity in Eclipse and also a Class with below method implemented from interface /IWBEP/IF_V4_DP_BASIC. 

@EndUserText.label: 'ZSAMPLE_SERVICE'
@ObjectModel.query.implementedBy: 'ABAP:ZCL_SAMPLE_SERVICE'
define custom entity ZSAMPLE_SERVICE
{
   key component_material : abap.char(40);
       fg_material  : abap.char(40);
       fg_material_descr : abap.char(40);
  
}

And Class as below

CLASS ZCL_SAMPLE_SERVICE DEFINITION
  PUBLIC
  inheriting from /iwbep/cx_gateway
  FINAL
  CREATE PUBLIC .

  PUBLIC SECTION.

    INTERFACES /IWBEP/IF_V4_DP_BASIC.
  PROTECTED SECTION.
  PRIVATE SECTION.
ENDCLASS.



CLASS ZCL_SAMPLE_SERVICE IMPLEMENTATION.
  METHOD /IWBEP/IF_V4_DP_BASIC~CREATE_ENTITY.

  ENDMETHOD.

  METHOD /IWBEP/IF_V4_DP_BASIC~CREATE_REFERENCE.

  ENDMETHOD.

  METHOD /IWBEP/IF_V4_DP_BASIC~DELETE_ENTITY.

  ENDMETHOD.

  METHOD /IWBEP/IF_V4_DP_BASIC~EXECUTE_ACTION.

  ENDMETHOD.

  METHOD /IWBEP/IF_V4_DP_BASIC~EXECUTE_FUNCTION.

  ENDMETHOD.

  METHOD /IWBEP/IF_V4_DP_BASIC~READ_ENTITY.

    DATA: TS_DATA TYPE zsample_service.
    TS_DATA-COMPONENT_MATERIAL = '12333333'.
    TS_DATA-FG_MATERIAL = '321'.
    TS_DATA-FG_MATERIAL_DESCR = 'This is material description'.


    IO_RESPONSE->SET_BUSI_DATA( TS_DATA ).
  ENDMETHOD.

  METHOD /IWBEP/IF_V4_DP_BASIC~READ_ENTITY_LIST.
    DATA: TS_DATA TYPE zsample_service,
          TT_DATA TYPE TABLE OF zsample_service.
    TS_DATA-COMPONENT_MATERIAL = '12333333'.
    TS_DATA-FG_MATERIAL = '321'.
    TS_DATA-FG_MATERIAL_DESCR = 'This is material description'.
    APPEND TS_DATA TO TT_DATA.
    IO_RESPONSE->SET_BUSI_DATA( TT_DATA[] ).
  ENDMETHOD.

  METHOD /IWBEP/IF_V4_DP_BASIC~READ_REF_TARGET_KEY_DATA.

  ENDMETHOD.

  METHOD /IWBEP/IF_V4_DP_BASIC~READ_REF_TARGET_KEY_DATA_LIST.

  ENDMETHOD.

  METHOD /IWBEP/IF_V4_DP_BASIC~UPDATE_ENTITY.

  ENDMETHOD.

ENDCLASS.

After this, I created service definition to explose above cds entity and then service binding.

When I do Get request to my service URL from postman I am  getting dump saying as below

Error analysis                                                                                    |
|    The application has indicated exception "CX_SADL_DUMP_APPL_MODEL_ERROR" as the                |
|     reason for the                                                                               |
|    termination:                                                                                  |
|    Processing was aborted because of an application modeling error: See previous                 |
|    in exception chain.                                                                           |
|                                                                                                  |
|    The exception is related to the previous exception                                            |
|     "LCX_RAP_QUERY_PROV_BAD_IMPLMNT" that occurred in                                            |
|    program "CL_SADL_UNMANAGED_QUERY_ENGINECP", in line 6 of include                              |
|     "CL_SADL_UNMANAGED_QUERY_ENGINECM00J". The reason for this exception                         |
|    was:                                                                                          |
|    Error occurred during execution of query provider 'ZCL_SAMPLE_SERVICE'                        |
|                                                                                                  |
|    The exception is related to the previous exception                                            |
|     "CX_RAP_QUERY_PROV_CONSTRUCTION" that occurred in                                            |
|    program "CL_RAP_QUERY_PROVIDER_FACTORY=CP", in line 6 of include                              |
|     "CL_RAP_QUERY_PROVIDER_FACTORY=CM004". The reason for this exception                         |
|    was:                                                                                          |
|    Error during construction of the Unmanaged Query Provider for entity                          |
|    ZSAMPLE_SERVICE                                                                               |
|                                                                                                  |
|    The exception is related to the previous exception "CX_SY_CREATE_OBJECT_ERROR"                |
|     that occurred in                                                                             |
|    program "CL_RAP_QUERY_PROVIDER_FACTORY=CP", in line 3 of include                              |
|     "CL_RAP_QUERY_PROVIDER_FACTORY=CM004". The reason for this exception                         |
|    was:                                                                                          |
|    Could not create object; reference variable does not match specified class                    |
|    ZCL_SAMPLE_SERVICE.

Can anyone help on this?

I appreciate your time and reply on this query.

Regards,

Omkar

My requirement is to have that same app available in a SAP Partner Demo Customizing tenant. Is this possible? and what's the best way to achieve this?

Thanks,

entry.title: How to maintain documentation for data elements on Cloud ERP / Public Cloud?
entry.content:
Hi community,

am I right that there is currently no option to maintain the documentation of a data element (a custom data element) on public cloud?

I mean the long text description/documentation where you can describe the usage of a data element in a long text format.

The reason why I would like to use that, is that I think if I could maintain that documentation, that the help content would be displayed accordingly in custom build Fiori Elements applications. Like it is done for standard data elements which have a documentation. I'm talking about the function on the Public Cloud launchpad when you press F1 in an application or on the question mark button on the top right. SAP Companion which is part of SAP Enable Now. I know that this product will be replaced with SAP WalkMe. But anyway, it would be great to have an option to maintain the long text documentation of custom data elements.

Even if the maintenance of such would be cumbersome (e.g. only creatable by creating a custom class which is creating the text - like it used to be for object like Application Job Catalog entries, before SAP provided UIs for this in Eclipse ADT), I would just love to be able to provide more information on a data element being used in SAP Companion automatically.

Any information on this would be very helpful.

Thank you
Daniel

entry.title: RAP : Managed with Unmanaged Save with Draft handling Create Mode issue
entry.content:
Hi All,
I have created a Managed app with unmanaged save having code to trigger BAPI to save transactional data.  I have added draft functionality to this app and all works find except for create mode. 

I am able to update root and dependent child node details successfully but when a new Document is created  the earlynumbering_create method is triggered twice and MAPPED table is populated twice.

Thus  cl_numberrange_runtime=>number_get returns 1 Doc # in first run [ Draft mode ]and second run [ After Save is Hit ], Next Document number is generated. This leads to issue that when Document is shown to user a Number is shown

On Save, next Docuement # is crated by method  earlynumbering_create

Could you please suggest if you have came across such issues and solution for the same. 

Thanks !!

entry.title: CSRF Token handling for ABAP Cloud Client Proxies
entry.content:
As on SAP S/4 HANA ≥ 2025, we are able to create http clients as Tier 1 ABAP Cloud compatible syntax. From my research, the unified approach  for ABAP syntax that can run on Public Cloud & on-prem systems will require we use Communication Targets. For example:

DATA: lo_client_proxy TYPE REF TO /iwbep/if_cp_client_proxy,
      lo_http_client  TYPE REF TO if_web_http_client,
      lo_cota         TYPE REF TO /coss/cota_internal.

lo_cota = NEW /coss/cota_internal(  ).
lo_http_client = lo_cota->create_web_http_client( ).

lo_client_proxy = /iwbep/cl_cp_factory_remote=>create_v4_remote_proxy(
  EXPORTING
    is_proxy_model_key = VALUE #( repository_id = 'DEFAULT'
                                  proxy_model_id  = lv_proxy_model
                                  proxy_model_version = lv_model_vers )
    io_http_client             = lo_http_client
    iv_relative_service_root   = '/sap/opu/odata4/sap/....' ).

Behind the scenes, /coss/cota_internal will be created based on the ABAP version you are running. In our case, I am supporting Public Cloud & on-Prem 2025+.

For Public Cloud - Communication Targets require: 1) communication scenario, 2) communication arrangmement and communication system configuration. This scenario is testing correctly.

For On-Prem - Communication Targets (COTA) are automatically visible in transaction 'APPLDEST' and require an Application Destination be set-up underneath the COTA. For our purposes, we want to create the client proxy to read the local ABAP Application Server, therefore we point the application destination to our own system.

 

The code above to generate client proxies, continues to work for on-prem systems but when ->execute( ) hits, a CSRF exception hits. As ABAP Cloud developers our ability to manage CSRF tokens is tightly restricted as the framework is meant to manage their usage.



/iwbep/cl_cp_request explicitly blocking developers from setting a x-csrf-token fetch

How can we interact with SAP API Hub Client Proxies using on-stack ABAP Cloud Syntax for S/4 HANA 2025 and newer systems?

 

----------------------------------------------

Update 23/12/2025

While I haven't been able to troubleshoot the CSRF token issue as it's behind the so-called 'SAP Paywall', a work-around is basing the client proxy creation on an internal http client. Much destination and authorization requirements are no longer needed and process is simplified. 

This workaround must be put into a Tier 2 wrapper then released for use in ABAP Cloud. I hope that SAP can give us clear instructions on how get around this CSRF token issue while working on-stack or even better, give us a release contract to create client proxies using internal http clients instead.

TRY.
 DATA lo_http_client TYPE REF TO if_http_client.

 cl_http_client=>create_internal(
  IMPORTING
   CLIENT = lo_http_client ).

WHEN /coss/if_api_hub=>co_doc_type-outbound_delivery.
  CLEAR: lv_proxy_model, lv_model_vers.
  IF is_public_cloud = abap_true.
    lv_proxy_model = '/COSS/SCM_OUTBOUND_DELIVERY'.
    lv_model_vers = '0001'.
  ELSE.
    lv_proxy_model = '/COSS/SCM_OB_DELIVERY_2025'.
    lv_model_vers = '0001'.
  ENDIF.

  lo_client_proxy = /iwbep/cl_cp_client_proxy_fact=>create_v2_remote_proxy(
    EXPORTING
    is_proxy_model_key = VALUE #( repository_id = 'DEFAULT'
                                  proxy_model_id =  lv_proxy_model
                                  proxy_model_version = lv_model_vers )
    io_http_client             = lo_http_client
    iv_relative_service_root   = '/sap/opu/odata/sap/API_OUTBOUND_DELIVERY_SRV;v=0002' ).

WHEN /coss/if_api_hub=>co_doc_type-product.

  CLEAR: lv_proxy_model, lv_model_vers.
  IF is_public_cloud = abap_true.
    lv_proxy_model = '/COSS/SCM_PRODUCT'.
    lv_model_vers = '0001'.
  ELSE.
    lv_proxy_model = '/COSS/SCM_PRODUCT_2025'.
    lv_model_vers = '0001'.
  ENDIF.

  lo_client_proxy = /iwbep/cl_cp_client_proxy_fact=>create_v4_remote_proxy(
    EXPORTING
    is_proxy_model_key = VALUE #( repository_id = 'DEFAULT'
                                  proxy_model_id = lv_proxy_model
                                  proxy_model_version = lv_model_vers )
    io_http_client             = lo_http_client
    iv_relative_service_root   = '/sap/opu/odata4/sap/api_product/srvd_a2x/sap/product/0002/' ).

....and so it goes

 

 

 



 

 

 

__PRESENT__PRESENT__PRESENT__PRESENT__PRESENT__PRESENT

entry.title: editable alv report
entry.content:
Hi Experts,

I have  created an editable alv report on PO.

check this code is fine or not. please let me know.

here is code :

TYPE-POOLS: slis.

TABLES: ekpo.

SELECT-OPTIONS: s_ebeln FOR ekpo-ebeln.


DATA: it_ekpo TYPE STANDARD TABLE OF ekpo,
wa_ekpo TYPE ekpo.

DATA: it_fcat TYPE slis_t_fieldcat_alv,
wa_fcat TYPE slis_fieldcat_alv,
wa_layo TYPE slis_layout_alv.

*----------------------------------------------------------------------*
* START-OF-SELECTION
*----------------------------------------------------------------------*
START-OF-SELECTION.

PERFORM get_data.
PERFORM build_fieldcat.
PERFORM display_alv.

*----------------------------------------------------------------------*
* Get data
*----------------------------------------------------------------------*
FORM get_data.

SELECT *
FROM ekpo
INTO TABLE it_ekpo
UP TO 100 ROWS
where ekpo~ebeln IN s_ebeln.


ENDFORM.

*----------------------------------------------------------------------*
* Build field catalog
*----------------------------------------------------------------------*
FORM build_fieldcat.

CLEAR it_fcat.

" EBELN - not editable (key)
CLEAR wa_fcat.
wa_fcat-col_pos = 1.
wa_fcat-fieldname = 'EBELN'.
wa_fcat-seltext_l = 'PO Number'.
APPEND wa_fcat TO it_fcat.

" EBELP - not editable (key)
CLEAR wa_fcat.
wa_fcat-col_pos = 2.
wa_fcat-fieldname = 'EBELP'.
wa_fcat-seltext_l = 'Item'.
APPEND wa_fcat TO it_fcat.

" AEDAT - display only
CLEAR wa_fcat.
wa_fcat-col_pos = 3.
wa_fcat-fieldname = 'AEDAT'.
wa_fcat-seltext_l = 'Change Date'.
APPEND wa_fcat TO it_fcat.

" TXZ01 - editable
CLEAR wa_fcat.
wa_fcat-col_pos = 4.
wa_fcat-fieldname = 'TXZ01'.
wa_fcat-seltext_l = 'Short Text'.
wa_fcat-outputlen = 40.
wa_fcat-edit = 'X'.
APPEND wa_fcat TO it_fcat.

" MATNR - display only (you can make it editable if needed)
CLEAR wa_fcat.
wa_fcat-col_pos = 5.
wa_fcat-fieldname = 'MATNR'.
wa_fcat-seltext_l = 'Material'.
APPEND wa_fcat TO it_fcat.

" MENGE - editable
CLEAR wa_fcat.
wa_fcat-col_pos = 6.
wa_fcat-fieldname = 'MENGE'.
wa_fcat-seltext_l = 'Quantity'.
wa_fcat-edit = 'X'.
APPEND wa_fcat TO it_fcat.

" NETWR - editable
CLEAR wa_fcat.
wa_fcat-col_pos = 7.
wa_fcat-fieldname = 'NETWR'.
wa_fcat-seltext_l = 'Net Value'.
wa_fcat-edit = 'X'.
APPEND wa_fcat TO it_fcat.

CLEAR wa_layo.
wa_layo-colwidth_optimize = 'X'.

ENDFORM.

*----------------------------------------------------------------------*
* Display ALV
*----------------------------------------------------------------------*
FORM display_alv.

CALL FUNCTION 'REUSE_ALV_GRID_DISPLAY'
EXPORTING
i_callback_program = sy-repid
i_callback_user_command = 'USER_COMMAND'
is_layout = wa_layo
it_fieldcat = it_fcat
TABLES
t_outtab = it_ekpo
EXCEPTIONS
program_error = 1
OTHERS = 2.

IF sy-subrc <> 0.
MESSAGE 'Error in ALV display' TYPE 'E'.
ENDIF.

ENDFORM.

*----------------------------------------------------------------------*
* USER COMMAND
*----------------------------------------------------------------------*
FORM user_command USING r_ucomm TYPE sy-ucomm
r_selfield TYPE slis_selfield.

CASE r_ucomm.

WHEN '&DATA_SAVE'. " Triggered by Save (Ctrl+S) in ALV

PERFORM save_data.

" Refresh ALV after save
r_selfield-refresh = 'X'.

ENDCASE.

ENDFORM.

*----------------------------------------------------------------------*
* Save data: update ALL rows from internal table to EKPO
*----------------------------------------------------------------------*
FORM save_data.

" Update all entries based on primary key (EBELN+EBELP)
MODIFY ekpo FROM TABLE it_ekpo.

IF sy-subrc = 0.
COMMIT WORK.
MESSAGE 'All changed rows saved successfully' TYPE 'S'.
ELSE.
ROLLBACK WORK.
MESSAGE 'Error while updating EKPO' TYPE 'E'.
ENDIF.

ENDFORM.

entry.title: Multilevel Hierarchy Tree view using RAP
entry.content:

│          └─ Description: of level 3 item 2

            └─ Level 3 (item 1)

Again multiple level 1 tabs can be present

 

Please help me with this

entry.title: sap Cloud authorization Object problem because of namespace to long /asdfghjk/
entry.content:
Hi everyone,

We are working in ABAP Cloud and created a custom namespace with 8 characters:

/asdfghjk/
(10 characters total including the slashes)

We already have thousands of CDS views and other objects created under this namespace.

At the final stage of a complex development, we now need to implement CDS Access Control .
For this, we need to create 4 authorization objects and reference them in CDS access controls.

Problem

Authorization object names are limited to 10 characters, and our namespace alone already consumes all 10 characters:

/asdfghjk/

Because of this:

  • We cannot create authorization objects in this namespace (no space left for a name).

  • CDS Access Controls under /asdfghjk/ can only reference authorization objects from the same namespace.

What we tried

  1. Create a shorter namespace /abc/

    • ✔ We can create authorization objects

    • ❌ We cannot use them in CDS Access Controls under /asdfghjk/ because namespaces differ

  2. Create Z authorization objects*

    • ❌ Same issue: CDS Access Controls in /asdfghjk/ can only reference objects from /asdfghjk/

Constraint

We cannot move all existing objects from /asdfghjk/ to a shorter namespace — this would involve thousands of objects and is not feasible.

Question

Is there any recommended solution or workaround for this situation in ABAP Cloud?

  • Is there a way to reference authorization objects from a different namespace in CDS Access Control?

  • Is there an SAP-recommended approach for long namespaces and authorization objects?

  • Or is this a known limitation with a documented workaround?

Any guidance or best practice would be highly appreciated.

Thanks in advance!

entry.title: Frontend Error: Value '00000000' violates facet information 'nullable=false'
entry.content:
Type Frontend Error
Short Text Value '00000000' violates facet information 'nullable=false

We have an unmanaged entity in RAP where one key field is of type date which even if date is populated, we face the below error.
Value '00000000' violates facet information 'nullable=false'.

Request @SAP to solve this bug, since similar issue was reported by user 4 years ago still no solution was suggested

Similar question asked in 2022 still no answer

ABAP RESTful Application Programming Model  ABAP Development ABAP Development SAP Quality Issue Management SAP BTP ABAP environment
